body_text:
What happened to the Resurrection Item? In the Sword Art Online anime, after getting the Resurrection Item Kirito gives it to Klein, as Kirito wanted it to bring Sachi back to life, but for it to work it had to be administered within 10 seconds.
Do they ever explain what happened to the item after that; the anime doesn't show if Klein ever used it or not?

How does Kirito come back to life when he's fighting Heathcliff? I was rewatching Sword Art Online and I notice that Heathcliff KILLS him and yet, he is able to come back and finish off Heathcliff, how is this so?
